mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, name, nickname, profile_image, email, gender, age, birthday, join_from, join_date, last_login, status) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{profile_image}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{birthday}, #{join_from}, sysdate, sysdate, #{status})
mapper.update: update member set last_login = sysdate where id = #{id}
